title: Complete distributed coordinator HA remaining work
description: Implement the remaining lease backend, leader fencing, DMN extraction, DAG scheduling scaffolding, and causal intervention guardrails for resilient autonomy control-plane behavior.
acceptance: Leader lease behavior supports production-ready backend abstraction with fallback
Mutating commands are consistently leader/epoch fenced
Decision logic is versioned and traceable through DMN-style policy evaluation
DAG scheduler foundations and replay-safe state transitions are implemented
Causal intervention metadata gates exist for disruptive controls
